title: ‚ÄòRefunds by 8pm today, luggage in 2 days‚Äô: Govt caps flight fares after Indigo fiasco
content: The government has imposed a Rs 18,000 domestic airfare cap and ordered IndiGo to restore full operations within two days, citing exorbitant fares and mass cancellations.  Aviation authorities invoked powers to ensure fair pricing and mandated refunds, aiming to protect passengers from opportunistic charges amidst a significant operational disruption.

title: 'Kitchen was dead end': Witnesses recall night of horror at jam-packed North Goa club
content: A devastating fire ripped through a North Goa nightclub, claiming at least 25 lives and injuring many more. The blaze, reportedly triggered by an explosion, occurred in an establishment operating without valid permissions. Fire safety norms were not followed, and access for emergency services was severely hampered, leading to a tragic loss of life.

title: Watch: Kangana Ranaut, Mahua Moitra and Supriya Sule dance together at wedding
content: BJP MP Kangana Ranaut, TMC MP Mahua Moitra, and NCP (SP) MP Supriya Sule were captured dancing together at industrialist Naveen Jindal's daughter's wedding. The trio performed a popular Bollywood song, with videos of their unexpected collaboration going viral on social media. Ranaut had previously shared behind-the-scenes photos of dance practice with her political counterparts.

title: 'I've said it many times... ': Gambhir's big comment on Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli - Watch
content: Providing weight to the senior contingent, Virat Kohli emerged Player of the Series in the ODIs against South Africa, scoring two centuries and a fifty ‚Äî a swift return to the highs he consistently reached from 2015 onwards. Rohit Sharma added a couple of fifties, underlining his enduring touch and class.

title: Bill Gates' daughter gets $30M for AI app: Gates says won't invest; works helpdesk
content: Phoebe Gates' artificial intelligence shopping startup, Phia, has raised $30 million in new funding. This investment values the company at $180 million. Bill Gates, Phoebe's father, has supported the venture with his time and experience. Phia aims to make online shopping smarter and more sustainable. The app offers price comparisons, discounts, and secondhand options.

title: Warner Bros-Netflix deal: Is the Tudum effect harmful for Indian cinema?
content: India's Multiplex Association warns that Netflix's acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery could harm the country's theatrical ecosystem. The shift threatens the supply of films crucial for cinema footfall, as Netflix prioritizes streaming over theatrical releases. While immediate impact may be limited, the merger raises concerns about content availability and theatrical windows.

title: 'Batting order is very overrated': Gautam Gambhir hints at chop-and-change policy
content: Head coach Gautam Gambhir defended his flexible batting order approach in white-ball cricket, calling it "overrated" except for openers. He highlighted Washington Sundar's adaptability and team-first attitude. Gambhir also acknowledged dew's significant impact on the ODI series but expects less influence in the upcoming T20Is.

title: Goa nightclub fire: Four tourists among 25 killed; were trapped along with staff in kitchen
content: A devastating fire at a North Goa nightclub has claimed 25 lives, including four tourists and 14 staff members. Six others were injured and are receiving medical attention. Initial investigations suggest the venue may have violated fire safety regulations. Authorities are conducting a thorough inquiry to determine the exact cause and ensure strict legal action against those responsible for this tragic incident.

title: A softer side of Elon Musk: Ex-wife recalls Christmas with Tesla CEO
content: Elon Musk's ex-wife Talulah Riley shared how he expressed his love despite immense pressure running multiple companies.  Forgetting a Christmas gift, Musk braved the snow barefoot to retrieve flowers from frozen ground, demonstrating his deep affection.  Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang also praised Musk's early adoption of AI technology, highlighting his unique vision.

title: Watch: Newly built NH 66 embankment collapses in Kerala; school bus, other vehicles trapped
content: A newly built National Highway 66 section in Kollam collapsed Friday, trapping vehicles including a school bus. Authorities are investigating the embankment failure, with initial suspicions pointing to the site's paddy field nature. This incident echoes a similar 2025 Malappuram collapse, prompting calls for stricter quality control and safety measures in ongoing highway projects.

title: 'Mota ho jaunga wapis': Rohit Sharma refuses to eat cake after India win - Watch
content: Yashasvi Jaiswal's maiden ODI century (116*) powered India to a commanding nine-wicket victory over South Africa, clinching the series 2-1. Rohit Sharma also shone with 75 runs, crossing 20,000 international runs. The duo's 155-run opening stand set the stage for a dominant chase, with Virat Kohli adding an unbeaten 65.

title: ‚ÄòMetaverse‚Äô budget cut: Zuckerberg plans slash resources; company loses $70 billion
content: Meta is reportedly planning to significantly cut its Metaverse budget by up to 30% for 2026, signaling a potential shift away from its virtual reality ambitions. This move follows substantial losses and a lack of consumer interest in its VR products. The company is now prioritizing its artificial intelligence initiatives.

title: New York house fire: Hyderabad cyber security professional dies in US
content: A devastating fire in Albany, USA, claimed the life of 24-year-old cybersecurity professional Sahaja Reddy Udumala from Hyderabad. The blaze engulfed a residential building, trapping Sahaja who had just returned from a night shift. Firefighters bravely rescued her and another severely injured individual. Investigations into the cause are ongoing.

title: Watch: CCTV catches UP cops ‚Äòdumping body‚Äô to avoid work
content: Shocking CCTV footage revealed police officers dumping an unidentified body outside a shop in Meerut's Lohiyanagar area overnight. The incident sparked public outrage, leading to the suspension of an outpost in-charge, a constable, and termination of a home guard. An internal inquiry has been launched to identify the deceased and investigate the alleged attempt by police to evade postmortem procedures.

title: Indigo fiasco: Airline chaos abates but baggage nightmare persists for passengers
content: Hundreds of passengers faced a chaotic ordeal at Kempegowda International Airport as IndiGo flights were cancelled, leading to prolonged waits for abandoned and often damaged baggage. Passengers described a system collapse with no clear communication or assistance, causing significant stress and loss.

title: Top finish! '12 sixes, 302 runs' - Virat Kohli says 'I feel really free in my mind'
content: Virat Kohli is back in top form, scoring 376 runs in his last four ODIs with two centuries and feeling liberated. After a Player of the Series award, he expressed his best rhythm in years, contributing to India's series win. Kohli, who holds the world record with 53 ODI centuries, rated his 135 in Ranchi as his best knock of the series.

title: LeBron James sends heartfelt 'family' message to fans after viral Toronto clip
content: LeBron James felt immense love from Toronto fans during the Lakers' recent game against the Raptors. The NBA legend, touched by the cheers and signs, called the fans "family" and expressed his deep appreciation for their unwavering support. He highlighted the special place Toronto holds in his heart, cherishing the warm welcome he always receives.

title: Grim theory on missing coach Travis Turner as veteran cop warns chilling clues
content: A missing Virginia football coach, Travis Turner, may never be found. He vanished from his home on November 20. Authorities charged him with child pornography offenses. A law enforcement expert states dense woods and wildlife make recovery difficult. Search teams are using advanced tools, but success remains uncertain. A reward is offered for information leading to his arrest.

title: Tim Pool reports shooting at home amid storm over Erika Kirk divorce debate
content: Tim Pool reported shots fired at his West Virginia home on December 5, hours after a podcast episode featuring Milo Yiannopoulos made unverified claims about Erika and Charlie Kirk. Pool's security team is reviewing footage, and he suggested the incident was meant to intimidate. Authorities have not yet confirmed the shooting.

title: 'Blow to Goa‚Äôs reputation': Most victims trapped at ‚ÄòBirch by Romeo Lane‚Äô basement
content: A devastating fire at a nightclub in Goa claimed at least twenty-five lives, primarily staff members trapped in the basement. The incident, one of the worst fire disasters in the state, has prompted an inquiry and calls for safety audits of tourist establishments. Officials confirmed the venue was operating without proper permissions.

title: ‚ÄòSafety norms not followed‚Äô: 25 dead, 50 injured in Goa‚Äôs Arpora nightclub fire
content: A devastating fire at Birch By Romeo Lane nightclub in Arpora, Goa, claimed at least 25 lives shortly after midnight on Sunday. Initial reports suggest a cylinder blast triggered the blaze, with most victims, including staff and some tourists, succumbing to suffocation in the smoke-filled basement. Authorities have launched a full investigation into safety norm violations.

title: IND vs SA: 'It's really a pity': Shukri Conrad accepts mistake after controversial 'grovel' comment
content: South Africa's coach Shukri Conrad regrets using the word "grovel," acknowledging it overshadowed their historic Test win over India. He clarified no malice was intended, aiming only to describe India's defensive approach. Conrad also expressed disappointment in missing a chance to win both Test and ODI series, highlighting learnings from Indian stars like Kohli and Sharma for his young squad.

title: 25 killed in Goa nightclub: PM Modi announces Rs 2 lakh ex-gratia for kin of deceased
content: Prime Minister Modi expressed profound sorrow over the Arpora nightclub fire, announcing Rs 2 lakh ex-gratia for deceased families and Rs 50,000 for the injured from PMNRF. The devastating blaze, reportedly caused by a cylinder blast, claimed at least 25 lives and injured around 50. Goa's Chief Minister has ordered a thorough investigation into the tragedy.

title: Delhi horror: 4-yr-old girl kidnapped, sexually assaulted; accused thrashed by locals
content: A 4-year-old girl was kidnapped and sexually assaulted in Narela by 25-year-old Rizwan, who was later arrested. The accused, reportedly under the influence of alcohol, lured the child into an empty room and locked it from the inside. The girl was rescued by her teacher and locals before police intervention.

title: Goa nightclub inferno: How cylinder blast sparked deadly blaze, killing 25 people
content: A devastating fire at a North Goa nightclub, Birch by Romeo Lane, claimed at least 25 lives late Saturday night, primarily club employees. Officials suspect a cylinder blast triggered the blaze, with most victims succumbing to suffocation. The Chief Minister indicated potential non-compliance with fire safety norms, promising action against management and officials.

title: Why so many people think they have ADHD today, and the real reasons behind the surge
content: More people are recognizing ADHD symptoms today. This surge in awareness stems from better understanding, social media visibility, and reduced stigma. While diagnoses have risen, experts suggest it reflects improved recognition rather than a true increase in cases. Professional evaluation remains crucial to distinguish ADHD from other conditions and ensure proper support.

title: Night shift bust: Bengaluru prison warder held for smuggling cigarettes in underwear
content: A Bengaluru Central Prison warder, Rahul Patil, was arrested for attempting to smuggle cigarettes and absorbent paper into the barracks. The banned items were discovered during a frisking at the prison entrance. This incident follows a recent ban on cigarette sales within the prison canteen.

title: 'Dhurandhar' collection: Ranveer Singh's spy actioner crosses Rs 50 crore mark
content: Ranveer Singh's latest film, 'Dhurandhar,' is taking the box office by storm with an impressive Rs 58 crore net earned in just its first two days. Directed by Aditya Dhar, this gripping spy thriller has surged in popularity, powered by outstanding word-of-mouth and packed theatres on Saturday.

title: 'Stay self-decided': EAM on Hasina's extradition; future hinges on circumstances
content: In a recent statement, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar highlighted that Sheikh Hasina's visit to India is a personal decision shaped by last year's developments. He underscored India's unwavering support for Bangladesh, reiterating the importance of democratic values. Jaishankar also defended India's sovereignty in foreign relations, stressing that no nation has the authority to dictate its alliances with others.

title: 'Played without captain': Gambhir hides behind 'excuses' for Test series defeat
content: Head coach Gautam Gambhir has firmly rejected social media speculation about split coaching for Indian cricket. He expressed surprise at these theories, urging commentators to respect their boundaries. Gambhir highlighted that the recent Test series loss to South Africa was discussed without acknowledging the absence of the captain and main batter in the crucial first Test.

title: Indian-origin driver Satwinder Singh jailed for over 7 years on rape charges
content: Satwinder Singh told the police that the incident was fabricated and whatever happened inside the cab was consensual. He also said New Zealand women are 'forward and promiscuous'. The court found him guilty of rape charges and sentenced him to seven years and two months' jail. The judge refused to give him any hardship discount because of the fact that he is a Sikh Indian, and not from New Zealand.

title: IndiGo fiasco: The real cost of a flight that never took off
content: IndiGo's widespread flight cancellations and delays have plunged passengers into chaos, forcing them to scramble for alternative travel at exorbitant prices. The airline's operational crisis, marked by crew shortages, has led to significant passenger distress and a sharp decline in its stock value. Authorities are now intervening to control fares and ensure refunds.

title: Bengaluru: Gynaecologist drugged, robbed by domestic helpers; Nepal couple on the run
content: A Bengaluru gynaecologist was drugged and robbed by her domestic helpers who fled with gold and cash. The incident occurred after the couple, hired just a month prior, sedated the doctor and her son. CCTV footage confirmed the theft, prompting a police investigation into the family's hiring practices.

title: IND vs SA: Kohli roasts Arshdeep after ODI series win over South Africa - Watch
content: India clinched the ODI series 2-1 against South Africa with a dominant nine-wicket victory. Virat Kohli, back to his best, was the series' top scorer and expressed a newfound mental freedom.  The bowlers, particularly Prasidh Krishna and Kuldeep Yadav, were instrumental in restricting South Africa, showcasing improved wicket-taking ability.  The win boosts Indian morale ahead of the T20 series.

title: Mumbai: After 8 years in jail, man acquitted in Pocso case over ‚Äòscanty evidence‚Äô
content: A 56-year-old driver, jailed for eight years, has been acquitted of sexual assault charges. The Pocso court found the prosecution failed to prove the victim's age and intellectual capacity, citing major inconsistencies.  Defense argued false implication due to a prior dispute. The judge highlighted scanty evidence, granting the accused the benefit of doubt.

title: People near mines inhaling danger: Lok Sabha data flags lung harm; calls grow for tighter safeguards
content: Recent findings indicate that neighborhoods adjacent to Indian mining operations are experiencing significant lung health issues and exposure to heavy metals, reflecting the dangers faced by workers. Research highlights concerning levels of abnormal lung function and signs of fibrosis, even among children, underscoring the severe impact of dust pollution.

title: Anna Kournikova & Enrique Iglesias Net Worth 2025: Career, Earnings, Biz
content: Tennis star Anna Kournikova and music icon Enrique Iglesias boast a combined net worth of $160 million in 2025. While Kournikova's fame transcended her $4 million prize money through lucrative endorsements, Iglesias' wealth stems from over 130 million record sales and global tours. Both have strategically invested in Miami real estate, contributing to their substantial shared fortune.

title: Not Rohit or SKY: Abhishek Sharma achieves what no Indian ever has in T20
content: Abhishek Sharma has etched his name in T20 history, becoming the first Indian to smash 100 sixes in a calendar year. His explosive 62 off 34 balls against Services in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy propelled him to this milestone. Sharma's remarkable year includes 1,499 runs at a staggering strike rate of over 200, showcasing his dominance.

title: Quad slams Red Fort blast, says bring culprits to justice
content: Quad nations have strongly condemned terrorism, including cross-border acts, and offered condolences for the Red Fort incident. Despite Quad summit delays, the group remains active, recently holding counterterrorism workshops and a tabletop exercise. Members emphasized information sharing and cooperation to keep the Indo-Pacific free from terror threats, with India and the US pushing for UN sanctions on terror groups.

title: India witnessing a ‚Äòpsychological renaissance‚Äô: PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi declared India is experiencing a "psychological renaissance," shedding a colonial mindset that once labeled its slow growth the "Hindu rate of growth." He asserted the nation is now a global economic driver, lauded for its rapid development amidst a worldwide slowdown. This transformation, he emphasized, signifies a profound shift in national confidence and global standing.

title: Projecting the final CFP top 12: Where does Alabama land?
content: One last assessment of how the committee could stack the top teams in the country ahead of the final ranking.

title: IU basks in glow of Big Ten title, CFP's top seed
content: Indiana capped off a memorable, magical Big Ten season Saturday night, outlasting Ohio State 13-10 in the conference championship game at Lucas Oil Stadium in Indianapolis to remain undefeated on the eve of the College Football Playoff's final release.

title: Smart, Bulldogs finally tame Tide, win SEC title
content: Gunner Stockton threw three touchdown passes as Georgia likely secured a first-round bye in the College Football Playoff and beat Alabama in the SEC championship game for the first time, pounding the Crimson Tide 28-7 on Saturday in Atlanta.

title: Duke stirs CFP pot, calls for bid as ACC champion
content: Duke won its first outright Atlantic Coast Conference title since 1962 and threw the College Football Playoff into chaos Saturday, when the unranked Blue Devils defeated No. 17 Virginia 27-20 in overtime, likely sending James Madison into the field.

title: Yan ends Dvalishvili's reign, reclaims title in thriller
content: Petr Yan got his revenge and recaptured the bantamweight title Saturday night, claiming a unanimous decision victory over Merab Dvalishvili in their rematch at UFC 323.

title: Pantoja injured in opening seconds; Van wins title
content: Alexandre Pantoja's flyweight title reign came to a shocking end Saturday night when he injured his left arm just 26 seconds in and lost his belt to Joshua Van via TKO.

title: DeBoer lobbies for Bama: Tide deserve CFP berth
content: Alabama coach Kalen DeBoer said Saturday's loss to Georgia in the SEC championship game shouldn't count against the Crimson Tide.

title: Sources: QB Watson set for Browns return in '26
content: Though quarterback Deshaun Watson is unlikely to play this season, the Browns are planning to have him on their roster next season, league sources told ESPN.

title: üèà NFL playoff picture entering Sunday
content: We're looking ahead to how the 14-team playoff picture could line up -- and who will win divisions -- en route to Super Bowl LX.

title: Yan defeats Dvalishvili by unanimous decision to become new bantamweight champion
content: A wild night at UFC 323 ended with two new champions crowned, a legend's retirement and a brutal injury.

title: Miami's first MLS Cup title caps off a long, ambitious project
content: A season that started with doubts ends in triumph as Lionel Messi helps steer Inter Miami to their first MLS Cup title.

content: Can the Falcons stop Jaxon Smith-Njigba? Does Adonai Mitchell have fantasy upside? Could the Raiders put the Broncos on upset watch?

title: Salah's dramatic comments take center stage in Liverpool's ongoing crisis
content: Liverpool's struggles continue following a 3-3 draw against Leeds United, but Mohamed Salah's postmatch comments overshadowed it.

title: Arsenal's thrilling late loss at Aston Villa blows title race wide open
content: Premier League title race is on! After drama at Villa Park, perhaps Arsenal's concern is they are feeling the pace.

content: Here's our latest intel heading into the MLB winter meetings, starting with the slugger who holds the key to the offseason.

title: Verstappen promises to go 'all out' for 5th F1 title
content: Max Verstappen has promised to go "all out" in pursuit of his fifth world title after securing pole position at Sunday's championship decider in Abu Dhabi.

title: Shedeur Sanders, Cam Ward and their NFL journeys to QB1
content: The Browns host the Titans on Sunday, the first NFL meeting between friends amid challenging rookie seasons.

content: How the long courtship of the Rebels coach finally came to a head, amid secret meetings and middle fingers.

content: Giannis paired with Steph Curry? Kevin Durant? Victor Wembanyama?! NBA insiders break down five deals the Bucks could consider.

title: üïö Big Ben, Harrison call for Tomlin-Steelers split
content: Two Steelers legends have joined the chorus of voices calling for the franchise to move on from Mike Tomlin, with Ben Roethlisberger even suggesting that Tomlin is a good fit for the vacant Penn State job.

title: üèÄ Clippers abruptly sever ties with Chris Paul
content: Chris Paul, one of the greatest players in Clippers franchise history, posted an Instagram story a little before 3 a.m. ET Wednesday that he had just learned he was being sent home to Los Angeles from Atlanta.

content: From All-Star outfielders to elite aces, here are the big names your team could be targeting this winter.

content: The draw is complete for the 2026 World Cup! What are the top matches to watch, and how will it all go down? We asked ESPN's writers to break down each group, highlight the storylines and make their predictions.

content: Barcelona have renewed their interest in Inter Milan's Lautaro Mart√≠nez in their hunt for a new striker. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

content: Friday's 'SmackDown' featured 'The Last Time Is Now' tournament final, a Damien Priest and Rhea Ripley reunion, and more.

content: If bye weeks or injuries have you seeking lineup help, consider the Jaguars' passing game and Titans defense.

title: Risers and fallers: Add Jaylon Tyson, trade away LeBron James, LaMelo Ball
content: Steve Alexander highlights fantasy basketball names trending upwards or downwards, with key takeaways for each.

title: Tourists Among 25 Killed In Massive Fire At Goa Club
content: A devastating fire ripped through the popular nightclub Birch by Romeo Lane late last night in Arpora, North Goa, resulting in the deaths of 25 people.

title: Former Kutch Collector Gets Five-Year Jail Term In Land Allotment Scam
content: A Special Court designated under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA), 2002, in Ahmedabad (Rural) has convicted former Bhuj (Kutch) District Collector Pradeep Nirankarnath Sharma for his involvement in a land allotment scam during his tenure

title: "We Saw Huge Flames": Witnesses Recount Goa Club Inferno That Killed 25
content: A massive blaze tore through a popular nightclub in North Goa's Arpora, harrowing eyewitness testimonies have begun to shed light on the chaotic moments surrounding the tragedy.

title: ‚Çπ22 Lakh To Finish School? CA Breaks Down Rising Cost Crushing Middle-Class Homes
content: A 2024 National Sample Survey Office (NSSO) report found that urban private unaided school fees have surged over 169% in the past decade, far outpacing both inflation and salary growth.

title: ‚Çπ600 cr Teaching Trading, ‚Çπ6 cr Lost Doing It: The Curious Case of Avadhut Sathe
content: ASTA described itself as a "victim of regulatory vacuum," arguing that its role had been mischaracterized due to the absence of clear guidelines for financial training institutes.

title: IndiGo Turmoil Eases, Fewer Flight Cancellations At Airports: 10 Points
content: Budget airline IndiGo appears to be limping back to normalcy with fewer flight disruptions on Sunday after their chaotic handling of the new pilot rest hour rules stranded lakhs of passengers across the country last week.

title: IndiGo Chaos: Aviation Minister Counters Rahul Gandhi's 'Monopoly' Charge
content: Amid the political blame game over the IndiGo chaos, Civil Aviation Minister Kinjarapu Ram Mohan Naidu has hit back at Congress leader Rahul Gandhi's "monopoly model" charge.

title: Village In Bastar, Once A Maoist Den, Gets Mobile Network For First Time
content: In regions of Chhattisgarh's Bastar once marked by fear and isolation due to Maoist violence, a visible shift on the ground is now unfolding. Mobile network arrived for the first time in the village of Kondapalli.

title: Narrow Exit, Palm Leaves, Big DJ Night: What Led To Goa Nightclub Inferno
content: The fire in a Goa nightclub, which has claimed 25 lives and left six injured, started on the dance floor. Some of the victims reportedly ran to the kitchen downstairs to escape the blaze

title: Which Are India's Top 10 Polluted Cities? UP Accounts For 6 On The List
content: Ghaziabad was the most polluted city in India in November, with a monthly average PM2.5 concentration of 224 microgram per cubic metre and air quality remaining above the national standards on all 30 days, according to a new analysis.

title: "One Who Gives 500 Crores Becomes Chief Minister": Navjot Singh Sidhu's Wife
content: Navjot Kaur Sidhu said they do not have money to give to any party but can transform Punjab into a "golden state".

title: 'No Work Calls After Office Hours': Right To Disconnect Bill Explained
content: The bill says employees should not be compelled to respond to official communication after work hours or on holidays.

title: Indian Student, 24, Dies In House Fire In New York
content: A 24-year-old woman from Telangana's Jangaon district died in a major fire accident at her house in the United States on Thursday. The victim, Sahaja Reddy Udumala, had moved to the US in 2021 for higher studies.

title: War-Torn Chernobyl Nuclear Plant's Protective Shield Damaged: UN Agency
content: A protective shield at the Chornobyl nuclear plant in war-torn Ukraine, built to contain radioactive material from the 1986 disaster, can no longer perform its main safety function due to drone damage, the UN nuclear watchdog said

title: Days After Trudeau's Post, Katy Perry Makes Their Relationship Instagram Official
content: American singer Katy Perry and former Canadian prime minister Justin Trudeau are in a relationship. The announcement was officially made by Perry in a series of photographs on her Instagram account, including one with Trudeau.

title: "Not Could Be, It Will Be": Aviation Minister Ram Mohan Naidu on  action against IndiGo
content: Ram Mohan Naidu told NDTV that all other airlines have faced no problems despite the new Flight Duty Time Limitations (FDTL) norms coming into effect in November.

title: UP Teacher On Poll Duty Dies Of Brain Haemorrhage, Family Blames 'Pressure'
content: A 58-year-old biology teacher deployed as a booth level officer (BLO) for the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) exercise died at his Nehru Nagar residence in Modinagar, officials said on Saturday.

title: Sunali returns to Birbhum from Bangladesh jail; Sweety‚Äôs family left waiting, hopeful
content: a kilometre away, another house filled with the same prayers stayed silent . the family still waiting for their daughter, Sweety, and her two sons to come back . she has been ordered on humanitarian grounds because of her advanced pregnancy . sweety has been the sole earner siddiq corruption case .

title: Congress cites Maniben‚Äôs diary, seeks apology from Rajnath
content: Congress accused defence minister Rajnath Singh of lying that Jawaharlal Nehru wanted to build the mosque using public funds . spokesman said the minister is sp-reading falsehoods about the country's first PM to ‚Äúimprove his relationship‚Äù with PM Narendra Modi .

title: Out(rage)d! Cashing in on your anger
content: 'rage bait' is defined as "online content deliberately designed to elicit anger or outrage by being frustrating, provocative, or offensive" it muscled its way to Oxford‚Äôs Word of the Year for 2025, beating out terms like 'aura farming'

content: this column features score projections, over/unders, win probabilities, and easily digestible fantasy advice for seasonlong leagues and DFS . this guide should help you with all sorts of decision-making, including sit/start, last-minute waiver adds and lineup choices .

title: How the U.S. matches up against group stage foes
content: usmNT have been handed a favourable draw with their opponents in world cup group d . we know who, where and when the tournament's hosts will play . there's a chance that the U.S. will end up in a group with three teams it has already played in 2025 .

title: Who has the most work to do? Where all 30 teams stand ahead of winter meetings
content: the focus is shifting to every team's retooling effort for 2026 . it's going to have a tough act to follow . the heavy lifting of this hot stove season still lies ahead . for now, we'll check in with our first offseason stock watch .

title: Champ Week: A new No. 1, is Bama out and ACC chaos
content: the college football playoff field will impact their final ranking on selection day . the committee is gathered at its headquarters in the Gaylord Texan Resort in Grapevine, Texas, to watch conference championship games . we're tracking all the conference title games and the impact on the field .

title: Harden passes Melo, up to 10th on scoring list
content: James Harden drops 34 points in the Clippers' loss to the Minnesota Timberwolves . he enters the NBA's top 10 of all-time scorers, surpassing Carmelo Anthony . Harden is ninth with 28,596, and former teammate Kevin Durant eighth with 31,051 .

title: Key intel on the games that could decide three division races
content: no division winners will be crowned this week in the NFL . three games Sunday could go a long way toward deciding who wins the NFC North and a pair of divisions in the AFC . the three first-place showdowns are the Chicago Bears (9-3-1) at Green Bay Packers (8-3) at Jacksonville Jaguars (8-4) in the aFC South and Pittsburgh Steelers (6-6) in the Baltimore Ravens .

title: IndiGo board‚Äôs crisis management group regularly monitoring situation: Airline
content: The board of Interglobe Aviation will take care of the challenges faced by its parent company of IndiGo customers and ensure refunds to passengers

title: Procedural lapses dent Telangana Assembly credibility, says BRS MLA Harish Rao in open letter to Speaker
content: In the letter to Assembly Speaker Gaddam Prasad Kumar, the former minister also lamented the reduction of the working days of the House

title: WHO, B-school study shows how digitally unified insurance systems can transform India's healthcare
content: India‚Äôs shift towards unified Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY) offers a unique real-world laboratory for understanding the power of digital integration in healthcare

title: Cheetah cub dies after being hit by unidentified vehicle in Gwalior
content: The nearly 20-month-old cub had ventured out of KNP and got separated from its mother. It died after being hit by an unidentified vehicle

title: IndiGo cancels over 220 flights at Mumbai, Delhi airports
content: The disruptions have resulted in hundreds of flight cancellations and delays in the last few days, causing hardships to thousands of passengers

title: Tamil Nadu Government frames rules for sale, exchange, lease and mortgage of temple lands
content: The Alienation of Immovable Property of the Religious Institutions Rules, 2025 lay down elaborate guidelines

title: Land acquisition delays hamper execution of railway projects in Tamil Nadu: Union Minister Vaishnaw
content: Ashwini Vaishnaw, in Parliament, said that the Centre is geared up to execute projects. However, success depends upon the support of the Tamil Nadu Government

title: ‚ÄòWe were going to speak on Christmas‚Ä¶ now I‚Äôm left with regret‚Äô: childhood friend grieves Hyderabad student who died in U.S. fire
content: Sahaja Reddy Udumala, a Master‚Äôs student in New York, succumbed to severe burn injuries affecting nearly 90% of her body

title: PM Modi to initiate debate on Vande Mataram in Lok Sabha on December 8
content: The Government sought a debate on Vande Mataram, composed by Bankimchandra Chatterjee, after PM Modi accused Congress of removing key stanzas in 1937 and sowing the seeds of partition

title: Thousands of devotees from across Bengal, other States arrive in Kolkata for mega Gita recital
content: 'Panch Lakkho Konthe Gita Path' (Gita chanting by five lakh voices) is being projected as the largest collective recital of the Bhagavad Gita ever attempted in the State and possibly in the country

title: Kerala local body polls: Candidates make final pitch to voters as open campaigning for Phase 1 draws to a close on Dec. 7
content: In play in the first phase of polling on Tuesday (December 9) are three Municipal Corporations, 39 municipalities, seven district panchayats and 75 block panchayats

title: Act against paper leaks, illegal mining: Bihar Deputy CM Samrat Choudhary
content: Mr. Choudhary, who holds the Home portfolio, also directed officers to immediately seize and auction vehicles used in illegal mining

title: Protesters vow to keep Tezpur University shut until formal steps taken to remove V-C
content: Students, teachers, and staff at the Tezpur University have been protesting since mid-September against the Vice-Chancellor for alleged corruption and irregularities, demanding his removal and an inquiry

title: Goa nightclub fire: Magisterial probe ordered; FIR lodged against owner, GM
content: The popular party venue at Arpora village, located around 25 km from the state capital Panaji, opened last year

title: Faced criticism from my own community for advocating creamy layer principle: former CJI Gavai
content: The former CJI Gavai, who retired as CJI recently, was delivering a lecture on "Role of Affirmative Action in Promoting Equal Opportunity" at Mumbai University

title: College teacher on SIR duty in U.P.‚Äôs Ghaziabad dies
content: The 58-year-old teacher died of a brain haemorrhage, officials said; college principal said he was under ‚Äòheavy work pressure‚Äô

title: IndiGo flight disruptions: Hyderabad airport sees 115 cancellations on Dec. 7, taking five-day total over 500
content: Although IndiGo has maintained that cancellations will reduce gradually, passengers with imminent travel plans remain unsure whether their flights will operate

title: There‚Äôs something in the Mumbai air
content: Even as doctors speak out about rising air pollution levels in Maharashtra‚Äôs capital city and environmental activists cry hoarse about political and bureaucratic lethargy, Mumbai‚Äôs 2.2 crore residents report increasing ill-health and higher medical bills

title: Goa night club fire LIVE: FIR lodged against owner and general manager as toll rises to 25
content: President Droupadi Murmu, PM Modi and other leaders express deep grief over the fire mishap in Arpora

title: Neighbours in uniform: police in north of Hyderabad reach out to senior citizens living alone
content: Officers from the North Zone of Hyderabad police are visiting senior citizens living alone, checking on their safety, verifying domestic help and offering support against cyber fraud, while also linking them with local communities to reduce isolation and improve access to routine assistance.

title: What did Putin‚Äôs visit to India achieve? | Explained
content: Where do India-Russia relations stand? What did the two sides agree on during the recent summit? What statements did both leaders make on the Ukraine war? Why is Putin‚Äôs visit significant at this juncture when India is negotiating a free trade agreement with the U.S.?

title: 25 killed, 6 injured in fire at nightclub in North Goa
content: As per initial information, the nightclub had not abided by the fire safety norms, Chief Minister Pramod Sawant said

title: West Bengal SIR row: SC, ST activists urge ECI to simplify rules, set up assistance camps
content: In a letter to the CEC, the rights body appealed for marginalised people to be able to link themselves to any relative across their extended family whose name is present in the electoral roll of 2002, and urged the Commission to organise assistance camps

title: S. Muralidhar | Humane justice
content: The former Chief Justice of the Orissa High Court will head a UN Commission to investigate human rights violations in the occupied Palestinian territories

title: J&K L-G and CM spar over age relaxation for job aspirants amid protests
content: Hundreds of job aspirants who have crossed the age bar of 32 are unable to sit for the examination. The Open Merit aspirants are protesting to increase the current upper age limit from 32 to 37 to bring it at par with the rest of the country.

title: ‚ÄòHistoric blunders‚Äô on J&K and China are Nehru‚Äôs legacy: BJP
content: Under the leadership of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, those ‚Äúblunders‚Äù are being corrected, says BJP spokesperson Gaurav Bhatia.

title: Field trips to city‚Äôs urban farms help schoolchildren to learn from nature
content: Size of these farms vary from 30 cents to a few acres, with crops such as paddy being grown on them; students are taught to do farm work and given farm fresh food, while introduced to a nature-centric lifestyle; some offer programmes and syllabuses focusing on practical aspects of farming

title: Former IAS officer gets five-year jail term in money laundering case
content: The court noted that the accused officer caused a loss to the government exchequer to the tune of ‚Çπ1.20 crore.

title: CPI(M) MP seeks JPC or judicial inquiry into ‚Äòexploitative airfare surge‚Äô
content: The crisis following the enforcement of revised Flight Duty Time Limitation (FDTL) norms has exposed deep structural failures in regulatory preparedness, market oversight, and consumer protection, leaving ordinary passengers dangerously vulnerable, says MP John Brittas

title: Government women‚Äôs polytechnic building in Nellore cries for repairs
content: Despite appeals for renovation works, Department of Technical Education has not sought funds from the State government, citing budget constraints

title: Appoint Leaders of Opposition for Maharashtra Assembly: Uddhav
content: More than a year after the Assembly election, ‚Äòthe LoP must be appointed and we have been demanding this‚Äô the Shiv Sena (UBT) leader said

title: 9 of 20 IndiGo flights cancelled in Visakhapatnam
content: While the IndiGo crisis has caused widespread disruption for flyers in major cities, the impact at Vijayawada has been limited

title: 2026 recruiting class rankings: USC secures its No. 1 spot
content: USC has put itself in position to snap the five-cycle streak of SEC teams finishing with the No. 1-ranked class . some programs, including the no. 1 overall player, Lamar Brown, remain unsigned . there are still questions to be answered and opportunities to make a move in the 2026 class rankings .

title: Congress top brass discusses Karnataka leadership issue, to meet again
content: Party president Mallikarjun Kharge, former party chief and Leader of Opposition in the Lok Sabha Rahul Gandhi and the general secretary in-charge of organisation K.C. Venugopal attended the closed door meeting at Congress Parliamentary Party (CPP) chairperson Sonia Gandhi‚Äôs official residence

title: Congress cites Maniben Patel‚Äôs diary entries, asks Rajnath to apologise for Babri claim
content: Congress general secretary (communications) Jairam Ramesh claimed the Defence Minister was spreading falsehoods to ‚Äúimprove his relationship‚Äù with Prime Minister Narendra Modi

title: Local body polls too complex to be a referendum on LDF government in Kerala
content: An analysis of the previous three-tier local body elections reveals that regional issues and candidates outweigh State-level political dynamics, particularly in the grama panchayats and block panchayats. State politics, however, is reflected in the district panchayat divisions, municipalities, and Corporations

title: Stalin virtually inaugurates village knowledge centres in Vellore, nearby districts
content: The centres consist of an administrative office, a skill training hall, a computer lab, a library, training rooms, an instructor‚Äôs office, and toilets. They also have public halls that can accommodate around 200 people

title: DGCA serves show-cause notice to IndiGo CEO Pieter Elbers
content: The CEO has to respond to the show-cause notice within 24 hours on why ‚Äúappropriate enforcement action should not be initiated against you‚Äù, placing him under direct regulatory scrutiny

title: J.P. Nadda alleges Hemant Soren of betraying people of Jharkhand
content: Mr. Nadda also accuses the Soren government of siphoning off funds from the mining of natural resources¬†

title: Modi govt. sparing IndiGo as it bought poll bonds: Congress
content: It says BJP encashed most of the ‚Çπ56-cr. bonds purchased by IndiGo‚Äôs parent firm and founder; alleges govt. favoured corporate allies and killed competition in the once-vibrant airline industry

title: Education is the foundation for social progress, says T.N. CM Stalin
content: He inaugurates two social justice hostels for women college students, additional buildings for 21 schools, and 25 village knowledge centres built at a total cost of ‚Çπ74.2 crore in various places in the State

title: India will help build ‚Äòinclusive‚Äô Bangladesh: High Commissioner
content: Pranay Verma India‚Äôs High Commissioner to Bangladesh, spoke in Dhaka on Maitri Divas, ‚Äòa day for remembrance and gratitude‚Äô commemorating India‚Äôs recognition of Bangladesh as an independent nation

title: NIMHANS must lead research on tech-driven behavioural disorders: Nirmala Sitharaman
content: The Finance Minister says AI-driven digital platforms, addictive social media algorithms, and excessive smartphone dependency are reshaping brain development, behaviour, learning

title: World waits for stories that dismantle, disturb, and rediscover: Banu Mushtaq
content: Writing, advocacy, and activism are like three rivers that meet in a confluence, says the Booker winner

title: Indian Army‚Äôs Trishakti Corps deploys on-site 3D concrete printing technology in forward areas
content: The capability has been developed in collaboration with IIT-Hyderabad under Project PRABAL (Portable Robotic Printer for Printing Bunkers and Accessories) and marks a powerful advancement in sustainable and mission-ready construction along the northern borders

title: Nothing like one‚Äôs own country, says Sunali after returning from Bangladesh
content: Four others, including Sunali‚Äôs husband who were allegedly pushed into Bangladesh in June earlier this year, are still awaiting their release from Bangladesh.

title: Police objects to transferring Kodakara heist case to PMLA court
content: The case, involving a ‚Çπ3.5 crore robbery on April 3, 2021 allegedly for funding a poll campaign, has resulted in 23 arrests and recoveries exceeding ‚Çπ1.5 crore.

title: Prison authorities who abuse disabled prisoners to be penalised under RPwD Act: SC
content: The order, based on a plea highlighting deaths of Saibaba and Stan Swamy, directs States to change their prison rules to provide assistive devices and enhanced family visitation rights to prisoners, undertrials with special needs

title: Delhi HC directs rival PMK factions to approach competent civil court to settle internal disputes
content: It says the Election Commission of India has no power or jurisdiction to give any finding with respect to internal disputes arising between rival sections within an unrecognised political party

title: Women experience amplified health risks due to rising heat: MSSRF study in seven States
content: Most women in extremely hot districts reported fatigue, dizziness, UTIs, mentrual cycle disruption in the summer months; higher wage losses, heightened stress, insomnia, and violence were also common

title: Prime accused in TTD Parakamani theft case confesses and explains asset donation
content: He rejected allegations that he had acted under duress; He said he had filed cases against individuals who had allegedly blackmailed him and circulated false information

title: Nitish Kumar launches JD(U) membership drive
content: The party has set a target of over 1 crore primary members, for which an intensive campaign will be run at the booth level.

title: Assam reinforces two-child policy for govt. jobs, electoral participation
content: The ceiling has been revised to three children for Scheduled Tribes, Scheduled Castes, ‚ÄúTea Garden Tribes‚Äù, and the Matak and Moran communities

title: ED trying to sabotage Kodakara hawala case: CPI
content: K.G. Shivanandan alleges the ED derailed the probe, ignored key witnesses, and acted as a political tool of the BJP

title: File on JKPSC exam returned same day; no response received for 4 days: L-G office
content: The Chief Minister‚Äôs advisor, Nasir Aslam Wani, also suggested that the examination should be delayed until the issue of age relaxation, currently pending the lieutenant governor‚Äôs approval, is addressed

title: NH collapse in Kollam: Centre begins steps to blacklist construction firm
content: An expert committee to visit the site soon, and further action will be taken based on the panel‚Äôs report

title: LDF will win 75 seats in Thiruvananthapuram Corporation: Sivankutty
content: Says BJP will lose more than half its sitting seats; terms allegations by BJP State president Rajeev Chandrasekhar ‚Äòpolitical bankruptcy‚Äô

title: Tourism sector faces massive cancellations as IndiGo crisis deepens

content: The State-wide event is being organised as part of Prime Minister Atal Bihari Vajpayee‚Äôs birth centenary celebrations¬†
